values: Prayer Vocalizes Our Abiding in ChristPrayer Vocalizes Our Abiding in Christ

Prayer says more than the words it speaks. The act of praying vocalizes a profound reality: God himself abides in us, and we abide in him.Prayer says more than the words it speaks. The act of praying vocalizes a profound reality: God himself abides in us, and we abide in him.
